title: Abort and Unwind
description: In this lab, we explore the panic strategy options abort and unwind, which can be used to handle errors in Rust code.

meta.title: Exploring Rust's Panic Strategies: Abort and Unwind
meta.description: Learn how to handle errors in Rust code using the panic strategy options 'abort' and 'unwind'.
meta.keywords: Rust, programming, error handling, panic, abort
